	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
</EFX_KEY_INFORMATION>
<EFX_COMPANY_INFORMATION>
<A NAME="FIS_COMPANY_INFORMATION"></A>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="11%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="3">
<B>
<A NAME="D346875D20F_HTM_TOC346875_12">
</A>
	ITEM&nbsp;4:
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="3">
<B>
	INFORMATION ON THE COMPANY
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="3">
<B>
<A NAME="D346875D20F_HTM_TOC346875_13">
</A>
	Introduction
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	We are a global pharmaceutical company, committed to increasing access to high-quality healthcare by
	developing, producing and marketing affordable generic medicines and a focused portfolio of specialty medicines. We operate worldwide, with a significant presence in the United States, Europe and many other markets around the world. Our key
	strengths include our world-leading generics expertise and portfolio, focused specialty portfolio, robust R&amp;D capabilities, global infrastructure and scale and dedicated leadership and employees.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	We believe we are strategically positioned to benefit from market, economic and regulatory trends in global healthcare. These trends
	include aging populations, the increasing prevalence of chronic diseases, economic pressure on governments and private payors to provide affordable healthcare solutions, legislative and regulatory reforms, scientific and technological advances,
	increased patient awareness and involvement, the impact of the digital revolution on consumer healthcare, increased spending on pharmaceuticals in emerging markets and the growing importance of over-the-counter (&#147;OTC&#148;) medicines.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	We operate our business in two segments:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
</B>
<B>
	Generic medicines
</B>
	, which includes chemical and therapeutic equivalents of originator medicines in a variety of dosage forms, such as
	tablets, capsules, injectables, inhalants, liquids, ointments and creams. We are the leading generic drug company in the United States and Europe, and we have a significant presence in certain ROW markets. This segment includes our OTC business,
	conducted primarily through PGT, our consumer healthcare joint venture with P&amp;G, as well as our world-leading active pharmaceutical ingredient (&#147;API&#148;) manufacturing business.
<B>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
</B>
<B>
	Specialty medicines
</B>
	, which includes our core therapeutic areas of central nervous system (&#147;CNS&#148;) medicines such as Copaxone
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	&reg;
</SUP>
</FONT>
	and Azilect
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	&reg;
</SUP>
</FONT>
	and respiratory medicines such as
	ProAir
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	&reg;
</SUP>
</FONT>
	and QVAR
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	&reg;
</SUP>
</FONT>
	. Our specialty medicines segment also includes products in other therapeutic areas, such as Bendeka
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	&reg;
</SUP>
</FONT>
	/ Treanda
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	&reg;
</SUP>
</FONT>
	in oncology and
	ParaGard
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	&reg;
</SUP>
</FONT>
	in women&#146;s health.
<B>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In addition to these two segments, we have other activities, primarily sales of third-party products for which we act as distributor in
	the United States, Israel and Hungary.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In 2016, 55% of our revenues were generated from our generic medicines segment and 40%
	of our revenues were generated from specialty medicines segment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In 2016, we generated 38% of our generic revenues in the
	United States, 30% in Europe and 32% in our ROW markets.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	For a breakdown of our revenues and profitability by segment and by
	geography, see &#147;Item 5&#151;Operating and Financial Review and Prospects&#151;Results of Operations.&#148;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Teva was
	incorporated in Israel on February&nbsp;13, 1944, and is the successor to a number of Israeli corporations, the oldest of which was established in 1901. Our executive offices are located at 5 Basel Street, P.O. Box 3190, Petach Tikva 4951033,
	Israel, and our telephone number is +972-3-926-7267. Our website is www.tevapharm.com.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="3">
<B>
<A NAME="D346875D20F_HTM_TOC346875_14">
</A>
	Strategy
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Our strategy aims to capitalize on our strengths&#151;including the largest generic medicines business in the world, a focused specialty
	medicines business, a global OTC business, our robust R&amp;D and API capabilities and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	22
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage26"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT">
<A HREF="#D346875D20F_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	global infrastructure and scale&#151;to better address patient needs. Fundamental to our strategy are our efforts to enhance our financial profile with diversified revenue sources and profit
	streams, backed by strong product development engines in both generics and specialty.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Underlying our strategy is our focus on
	cash generation and debt repayment. As we execute our disciplined strategy, we seek to continue generating significant cash flow, which we plan to use to pay down debt and maintain our current credit ratings.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The key elements of our strategy are:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<I>
	&#149;
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<I>
</I>
</B>
<B>
<I>
	Driving continuous growth and improving profitability in our generics business
</I>
</B>
<B>
<I>
	.
</I>
</B>
	We are the leading generics
	company worldwide, delivering high quality generic medicines at competitive prices. Our strong legacy generics business, combined with the Actavis Generics business, has a world-leading product portfolio, comprehensive R&amp;D capabilities, a robust
	product pipeline and an efficient global operational network. Our generics business includes:
<B>
<I>
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="9%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#149;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a wide-reaching commercial presence, as the market leader in the United States and a top-three leadership position in over 40 other countries;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="9%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#149;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a global portfolio of more than 1,800 molecules, treating millions of patients every day around the world; and
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="9%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#149;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a world-leading generic pipeline that includes, as of December&nbsp;31, 2016, 330 product applications awaiting FDA approval in the U.S., including 71
	tentative approvals. This total reflects all pending ANDAs, supplements for product line extensions and tentatively approved applications and includes some instances where more than one application was submitted for the same reference product.
	Nearly 70% of pending applications include a paragraph IV patent challenge, and we believe we are first to file with respect to 95 of these products, or 119 products including final approvals where launch is pending a settlement agreement or court
	decision. During 2016, we received 1,655 generic approvals in Europe, including two EMA approvals valid in 30 EU member states, and approximately 2,435 marketing authorization applications pending approval in 37 European countries, including one
	application pending with the EMA for four strengths in 30 countries. Our global pipeline of generic products positions us for an increasing number of first-to-file opportunities and other key generic launches, as well as further expanding our
	product portfolio
<I>
	.
</I>
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:8%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	This world-leading product pipeline, which includes a large number of smaller
	opportunities, will lessen our dependence on any single product and be critical to our growth while improving profitability in the face of the continuing price erosion expected in the generics market.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<I>
	&#149;
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<I>
</I>
</B>
<B>
<I>
	Achieving synergies from the Actavis Generics acquisition and driving efficiency and effectiveness throughout our
	organization
</I>
</B>
<B>
<I>
	.
</I>
</B>
	We seek to manage our business to extract the greatest benefit from synergies from the Actavis Generics acquisition. At the same time, we are expanding our cost reduction activities to continue improving the
	profitability of our business.
<B>
<I>
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<I>
	&#149;
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
<I>
</I>
</B>
<B>
<I>
	Delivering on the promise of our specialty pipeline
</I>
</B>
<B>
<I>
	.
</I>
</B>
	We seek leadership positions in our core therapeutic
	areas of CNS (including multiple sclerosis (&#147;MS&#148;), neurodegenerative diseases, movement disorders, pain care and migraine) and respiratory (including asthma and chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (&#147;COPD&#148;)). We have taken
	significant steps to leverage the existing platforms in our core therapeutic areas to develop promising pipeline assets, addressing illnesses such as MS, Huntington disease, chronic pain, migraine and severe respiratory conditions.
<B>
<I>
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>

	Maintaining Copaxone
</I>

</I>

	continue to support

<I>

</B>
	Copaxone
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	&reg;
</SUP>
</FONT>
	and our other key products by vigorously
	defending our intellectual property and through patient support programs and product enhancements.
<B>
<I>
</I>
</B>
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="3">
<B>
	Actavis Generics and Anda Acquisitions
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In August 2016, we completed our acquisition of Allergan plc&#146;s worldwide generic pharmaceuticals business (&#147;Actavis Generics&#148;). At closing, we paid Allergan consideration of approximately
	$33.4 billion in cash and approximately 100.3&nbsp;million Teva shares. The acquisition significantly expanded our generics product portfolio and pipeline, R&amp;D capabilities and global operational network.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In October&nbsp;2016, we completed the acquisition of Anda Inc., the fourth largest distributor of generic pharmaceuticals in the United
	States, from Allergan plc, for $500 million in cash.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	As part of the Actavis Generics acquisition, we divested certain
	products in the U.S. and Europe, to meet antitrust regulatory requirements. In January 2017, we completed the divestiture of certain assets and operations of Actavis Generics in the U.K. and Ireland for GBP 603&nbsp;million, as required by our
	undertaking to the European Commission in connection with the Actavis Generics acquisition.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="3">

	Other Recent Transactions
</B>
</FONT>
</P>

<I>
	:

</B>
	In September 2016, we entered into a collaborative agreement with Regeneron
	Pharmaceuticals, Inc. to develop and commercialize Regeneron&#146;s pain medication product, fasinumab. We paid Regeneron $250 million upfront and will share the global commercial benefits of this product, as well as ongoing associated research and
	development costs of approximately $1 billion, equally with Regeneron. Following the termination of the phase 2 clinical study for chronic low back pain in October 2016, we and Regeneron plan to design a phase 3 study in chronic low back pain that
	excludes patients with advanced osteoarthritis. See &#147;&#151;Specialty Medicines&#151;Central Nervous System&#151;Pipeline&#148; below.
<B>
<I>
</I>

<I>

	In April&nbsp;2016, we established a business venture with Takeda in Japan in
	which we own a 51% stake and Takeda owns the remaining 49%. The business venture combined our Japanese generics business with Takeda&#146;s portfolio of off-patent products, leveraging Takeda&#146;s leading brand reputation and strong distribution
	presence in Japan with our expertise in supply chain, operational network, infrastructure and R&amp;D, to meet the wide-ranging needs of patients and growing importance of generic medicines in Japan through the provision of off-patent
	medicines.
